channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jack Ciattarelli approved to sue Mikie Sherrill for saying his 'opioid propaganda' killed people
item.description: New Jersey gubernatorial candidate Jack Ciattarelli was approved on Monday to launch a defamation lawsuit against his Democratic opponent, Mikie Sherr...

item.title: Oversight Committee Urges DOJ To Probe And ‘Void’ Pardons Signed By Biden’s Autopen
item.description: The committee notes Biden was, “losing command of himself,” and his executive actions, especially the pardons, cannot be deemed his own.

item.title: We Need the Pro-Life Old Guard
item.description: The sidelining of pro-life intellectuals has contributed to Trump’s weakening pro-life position, including the new push for IVF.

item.title: Report: Hospitals Use Electronic Medical Records To Coax Children Into Gender ‘Transition’

item.title: Will Trump’s FTC Rein In Lina Khan’s Abuses?
item.description: The consumer welfare standard should once again guide the commission’s work.

item.title: Milei’s Triumph
item.description: His party’s over-performance in Argentina’s midterm elections provides a boost to his free market reforms.

item.title: Trump Appeals His Convictions in Manhattan Criminal Case
item.description: With an embarrassment of riches to choose from, the president’s appellate team raises five claims.

item.title: Border Patrol official Bovino in court to answer questions about Chicago immigration crackdown

item.title: Democrats Don’t Get To Play The Patriotism Card While Embracing Anti-Americanism
item.description: The anti-Americanism within the Democrat Party leaves no room for its members to play the patriotism card in opposition to Trump.

item.title: RNC Election Integrity Machine Revs Up In Virginia And New Jersey
item.description: The RNC’s election integrity team, sources on the ground tell The Federalist, continues to build on its 2024 election protection campaign.

item.title: Nicolle Wallace Is Blatantly Lying About Democrats’ Assassination Prep
item.description: Wallace's claim that no Democrat has ever suggested Trump is Hitler is demonstrably false.
